channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Manhole cover seriously loose, 23rd June
item.description:
It sounds like a shogun when driven over and its been like this for months. It must be dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20,20A, Maylands Drive, Albany Park, Sidcup, London

item.title: 10inch pothole, 23rd June
item.description:

item.title: Overgrown footpath, 23rd June
item.description:

item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: Damage to fencing, 23rd June
item.description:
Damage to fencing creating access into the not yet reopened park. Vandalism likely (as has happened at least twice already). As there is no active work taking place on site this is likely to go unnoticed. (And for goodness sake, please reopen the park! It's been 13mths)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): William Cory Promenade, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dilapidated horse box dumped, 23rd June
item.description:
Hi Bromley from a Street Friend, this dilapidated old horse box has been dumped on the road near Thicket Road gate Crystal Palace park for about two months now, could it be removed? Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thicket Road, Crystal Palace, London

item.title: London Palladium blocking the pavement consistently Monday to Saturday 9.30 till 10.30, 23rd June
item.description:
